code: @Override public void begin(TransactionContext context) {     TransactionDefinition definition = new DefaultTransactionDefinition(TransactionDefinition.PROPAGATION_NESTED).     TransactionStatus status = this.transactionManager.getTransaction(definition).     context.transaction(new SpringTransaction(status)). }
private TransactionStatus getTransactionStatus(TransactionContext ctx) {     SpringTransaction transaction = (SpringTransaction) ctx.transaction().     return transaction.getTxStatus(). }
